General.Name: Xiamen XGMA Machinery Co Ltd
General.Description: Xiamen XGMA Machinery Company Limited, through its subsidiary, engages in the manufactures and sells engineering machinery products in China. The company's products include wheel loaders, hydraulic crawler excavators, wheel excavators, and full-face tunnel boring machines. It also offers road equipment, including motor graders, pneumatic rollers, walk behind vibratory rollers, small tandem vibratory rollers, bulldozers, and hydraulic vibratory rollers; and industrial machinery, such as diesel and electric forklift trucks, electric pallet stackers, and side loading forklifts. In addition, the company provides loader, excavator, and forklift parts. Its products are used in construction sites, mines, factories, ports, warehouses, agriculture and forestry, water conservancy, metros, tunnels, pipe racks, and underground space development activities. The company exports its products to Europe, Africa, Asia, the Americas, and internationally. Xiamen XGMA Machinery Company Limited was founded in 1951 and is based in Xiamen, China.
